text: In May 2018, Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, Director-General of WHO, issued a call to action for the elimination of cervical cancer.A WHO Global Strategy to accelerate the elimination of cervical cancer as a public health problem was presented and unanimously endorsed by the Seventy-third World Health Assembly in August 2020.
